examples.example: 登上山顶，眼前的美景仿佛多了一层梦幻的色彩。

translate.english: Climbing to the top of the mountain, the beautiful scenery in front of us seems to have an additional layer of dreamy color.

examples.example: 阳光透过树叶的缝隙，在地面上洒下了一层斑驳的光影。

translate.english: Sunlight filters through the gaps of leaves, casting a mottled pattern of light and shadow on the ground.

examples.example: 经过努力，他终于突破了一层又一层的难关，取得了巨大的成功。

translate.english: Through hard work, he finally broke through layer upon layer of difficulties and achieved great success.
